Editor Release Notes

Release V2.26 - June 15, 2007

  • Fix bug that caused a wave file of folder that was renamed to get duplicated. This caused a problem when the project was saved and then reloaded.

Release V2.25 - June 11, 2007

  • Allow melodic banks or drum programs to be deleted.
  • Allow separate editing of Bank MSB and LSB to avoid confusion.
  • Redesign melodic bank management in native engine.
  • Allow export of melodic banks and drum programs to 'C' source code.
  • Improve progress dialog. Now shows stack of progress messages when downloading to the target.
  • Fixed "Cancel" of download when "Hear"ing an instrument in the Orchestra editor.

Release V2.24 - May 29, 2007

  • Fixed bug that prevented adding a newly created WaveTable to a WaveSet.
  • Added Universal Binary support for Intel based Macs.

Release V2.23 - May 24, 2007

  • Add support for adding extra Melodic Banks or Drum Programs to the Orchestra editor using the "Orchestra" menu.
  • Add support for changing the sample rate of an entire tree in a batch process. Select part of wave tree then select "Change Sample Rate" in File menu of WaveTable tab.
  • Store sustain loop info in original values before sample rate conversion to improve pitch accuracy when not quantizing sample rates.
  • Fixed bug caused by not updating all the instruments that used a WaveSet if the WaveSet changes.

Release V2.22 - May 16, 2007

  • Fixed bug in import when replacing a WaveTable with a different ID. It used to complain the name was not unique.

Release V2.21 - May 11, 2007

  • Added "Import Project" feature that lets you import WaveTables, WaveSets and Instruments from another Project.

Release V2.16 - May 7, 2007

  • Handle Cancel more smoothly when user cannot find the wave repository.
  • Fixed bug that caused instrument editor to not play notes from the keyboard when instrument opened, closed then reopened.
  • Prevent renaming of top level wave repository. Do that outside of this editor.

Release V2.15 - internal

  • Eliminate benign error message related to freeing memory twice.
  • Fixed bug related to above message when trying to connect to remote synth at same time as previewing sounds.
  • Initialize selection range when wavetable editor first opened. Was causing display to go blank if "Fit to Selection" was clicked.
  • Text fields now only accept valid characters. For example a double precision numeric field like the "sample rate" field will only accept 0-9 or '.'.
  • Fixed bug that caused songs to sometimes play at the wrong tempo in the Song Editor.
  • Fixed bug that caused the wavebase to not ask to be saved after finding a wave repository file that had moved.
  • Fixed bug that caused "waveSet not found" error when using VST or AU plugin.

Release V2.12 - April 26, 2007

  • Fixed bug that caused incorrect loop information to be exported to a WAV file if the wavetable had no loop.
  • Reduce memory usage when exporting WAV files.

Release V2.11 April 23, 2007

  • Added export dialog for SF2 with SetName, AuthorName, Comment, Copyright, etc.
  • Limit pitch range in SF2 to maximum deviation from original pitch.
  • Sped up launch of editor application significantly.
  • Allow pitches in region editor to be entered as either name (FS4 or F#4) or number (54)
  • Fixed improper sequence when creating a New Project and copying orchestra files.
  • Fixed bug that caused MIDI Files with drums out of range to play incorrectly when played from the editor.
  • Handle no-pitch when sorting tables in WaveSet.
  • Allow same table in wavesets at different pitches
  • Allow pitch region to override pitch in wave table.

Release V2.10, April 10, 2007

  • Export SoundFont2 files of melodic instruments in an orchestra that use WaveTables.
  • Fixed bug that caused a crash if there was a gap in the pitches of regions in a WaveSet and one played a note in the gap.
  • Fixed bug that caused WaveSets to be downloaded without having automatic pitch ranges assigned when playing songs.
  • Use color to show gap or overlap in pitches of regions in a WaveSet.
  • Trap opening wrong XML file, for example an instruments file, instead of project XML file.

Release V2.09, April 6, 2007

  • Write lowPitch, highPitch info to engine so that the keyboard zones can be previewed.
  • Write two samples past end of loop when exporting WAV as guard points.

Release V2.08, March 31, 2007

  • Export WAV files with loop information.

Release V2.06, March 22, 2007

  • Added "Pitch Change" that lets you change the pitch of a sample.
  • Support dynamic changing of measured pitch, pitch change and sample rate change.
  • Show size of potential loops in status bar so user can select optimal number of cycles.
  • Added native audio support to the Macintosh version to eliminate audio artifacts caused by JavaSound when previewing wavetables on Mac. Windows already OK.

Release V2.05, March 19, 2007

  • Load default loop information and default pitch from WAV and AIFF files when creating new WaveTables.
  • Automatically expand the scale when drag selecting and the mouse goes off the left or right of the waveform display.
  • Fix bug where loop was removed when using "Trim After Selection" option.

Release V2.04, February 22, 2007

  • Reduced window sizes for laptops.
  • Add handler for missing directories in wavebase.

Release V2.02, July 20, 2006

  • Improved support for AU plugins under Logic Express.
  • Project wizard now has "Copy" option that lets you make a copy of an existing orchestra, instrument or wavebase file.
  • Renaming or moving files or folders in Wave Tree editor is now tracked so that changes will not break other projects.
  • Wavetables in WaveSet drag-drop panel now sorted by pitch.
  • Deleting last wavetable in group no longer closes entire tree, just folder.
  • Pitch setting by ENTER key, not button. Now acts like sample rate field.
  • Added a black and white Music Keyboard for previewinig instruments. Covers pitches 0- to 127.
  • Double clicking on a WAV now just opens group of wavetables instead of creating a new wavetable. Added an "Add WaveTable" button to replace functionality of double click.
  • Fixed various refresh problems involving menus and deleting WaveTables.

Release V2.00, June 27, 2006

  • Added support for AU plugins on Macintosh.
  • Added Synth menu for switching between local and remote synthesizers. The remote synthesizer may be a plugin or a synthesizer running on another machine on the network.
  • Added a "Synth" tab in Preferences dialog for selecting a remote synth on the network.
  • Fader values now update on screen while fader being dragged.
